definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: People drink wine, will be able to.
sentences.chinese: 人喝了好酒，就會變得滔滔善辯。

sentences.english: It was a most philosophic and jesuitical motorman .
sentences.chinese: 這是個十分善辯且狡猾的司機。

sentences.english: It was a mostphilosophic jesuitical motorman.
sentences.chinese: 這是個十分善辯且狡猾的司機。

sentences.english: He was a silver-tongued orator who convinced many people to support him.
sentences.chinese: 他是個能言善辯的演說家，能贏得很多人的支持。

sentences.english: You argue well, still I am not convinced.
sentences.chinese: 你雖然善辯，但我仍然不夠信服。

sentences.english: Many believe that a politician has to be silver-tongued.
sentences.chinese: 許多人認爲政客必須要能言善辯。

sentences.english: "The more articulate, the less say" is an old Chinese proverb which I just make up myself.
sentences.chinese: 者善辯“是我自己剛剛虛構的一句中國古諺。

sentences.english: Obama is indeed eloquent, but diplomacy can not just empty words.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬的確能言善辯，但外交上不能光說空話。
